alert.note: Alert for Guaynabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 28 at 7:24PM ADT until April 28 at 8:45PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Guaynabo County in Puerto Rico... * Until 745 PM AST. * At 624 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 4 and 7 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Emergency Managers reported multiple floodings across the municipality. Flash flood in San Patricio has people trapped in their cars. Rescue efforts ongoing. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
